scripts.test:debug: cross-env LOG_LEVEL=debug npx bddgen && cross-env LOG_LEVEL=debug npx playwright test --debug
scripts.test:api: cross-env TEST_TYPE=API npx bddgen && cross-env TEST_TYPE=API npx playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.test:ui-only: cross-env TEST_TYPE=UI npx bddgen && cross-env TEST_TYPE=UI npx playwright test
scripts.test:both: cross-env TEST_TYPE=BOTH npx bddgen && cross-env TEST_TYPE=BOTH npx playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.allure:report: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
